Catalan: <s>Corea del Nord declara que no es desarmarà unilateralment «de cap manera» si no s'aprecien signes de confiança</s>
Spanish: <s>Corea del Norte declara que no desarmará unilateralmente «de cap manera» si no se aprecian signos de confianza</s>
English: <s>North Korea says it will not disarm 'unilaterally' if there are no signs of confidence</s>
North Korea says it will not disarm 'unilaterally' if there are no signs of confidence
SEOUL, South Korea (AP) — North Korea says it will not disarm "unilaterally" if there are no signs of confidence from the U.S. and South Korea.
The North's official Korean Central News Agency said Tuesday that Pyongyang's "self-imposed moratorium" on nuclear and long-range missile tests will remain in place if the U.S. and South Korea don't take "corresponding measures."
KCNA says North Korea's "self-imposed moratorium" on nuclear and long-range missile tests will remain in place if the U.S. and South Korea don't take "corresponding measures."
